attributes.action: want protection from todays society, and ask for better standards and equipment when protecting clients and their properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: security forces in other country's have the rights to carry batons and sprays and are protected with bulletproof/stab vests, this country doesn't have it, please can this government act on this issue, we have a legal requirement to be issued with these items,we are only doing our jobs and we do have the rights to protecting our clients and their properties
